name: Brutal Zombie War Free
description:
This is the free version of Zombie War

Zombie War is a challenging and addictive board game.

The goal is to remove all the pieces of the other player by forming certain patterns. There are two stages in the game. In the first stage, each player place one piece on the board by turns. When there is no space on the board, the second stage begins. Players can now move their pieces. In the game, player try to form as many patterns as possible and prevent the other player from forming patterns.

Zombie is attacking. We must defend ourselves. Try it and you won't regret!

Features:
* Two roles to play: zombie and human
* Three game modes: Play against AI player. Play with online players. Two players play on one device
* Ranking system to keep you more challenged
* Hint system that will guide you through the game
* Online leaderboard
* Scaring graphics and sounds
* Hours of enjoy for FREE!
* And of course... the zombie!
